name: artnaweb-monitor
description: ArtnaWEB Monitor - Sistema de Monitoramento de Sites

scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npx concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,yellow" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
